title: The Subtle Knife - BBC Dramatisation
description:
The Subtle Knife
                       - BBC Dramatisation -

Philip Pullman&#039;s thrilling fantasy comes alive in this BBC Radio 4 dramatisation.
A breathtaking epic, the award-winning "His Dark Materials" trilogy spans a 
multitude of worlds. The second instalment, "The Subtle Knife", introduces 
Will Parry - a young boy in search of his long-lost explorer father. 
Will&#039;s discovery of an extraordinary &#039;window in the air&#039; near the Oxford ring
road leads him out of our world and into the strange and unsettling Cittagazze. 
There he meets Lyra, a girl who is herself searching for something: the secret of
the mystical substance Dust. Moving back and forth through the portal, Will and
Lyra join forces in their quest. As they make allies and enemies along the way,
they also learn of the subtle knife. An object which many would kill to possess,
the knife has incredible powers, and Will finds himself reluctantly in a fight 
for its possession. Ray Fearon, Emma Fielding, Peter Marinker and Jack Klaff are
amongst the cast in this gripping dramatisation.

 ----------------------------
| Total Run Time.....02:26:13 |
